1 Kings or 3 Kings__14.19__The book of the words of the days of: This book, which is often mentioned in the Book of Kings, is long since lost. For as to the books of Paralipomenon, or Chronicles, (which the Hebrews call the words of the days,) they were certainly written after the Book of Kings, since they frequently refer to them.
1 Kings or 3 Kings__14.24__The effeminate: Catamites, or men addicted to unnatural lust.
